Package database

Class CountryShares

java.lang.Object
database.CountryShares
public class CountryShares extends Object
This class is trying to connect to remote database to obtain information about shares of countries in the specific asset from the table that contains "Ticker" as first column and different countries as the other columns.

Example of table:
Ticker Australia Belgium ...
FXDM 0.0780 0.0040 ...
FXRW 0.0550 0.0000 ...
...

If connection has not been established or another exception occurred then default values are used.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.3
Author:
lennardjones
